settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure custos preferences
settings.checkOnStartupDesc: Automatically check for new versions when the app starts
settings.deleteAfterUseDesc: Automatically delete custos when you close it

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcomeMessage: Program written for COBRA servers to detect third-party software.
dashboard.failedToLoad: Failed to load. Check internet connection.

scan.scanDescription: Scan AppData, Registry, Processes, Prefetch, Steam and more

manual.title: Manual Check

manual.telegramBotsDesc: Open these bots to check if the user has interacted with them

utilities.title: Utilities
utilities.subtitle: Useful tools for anti-cheat verification
utilities.lastActivityViewDesc: Shows computer activity log including program executions, file operations and more
utilities.usbDeviewDesc: Lists all USB devices ever connected to the computer with dates and details
utilities.everythingDesc: Instant file search tool that indexes all files on your drives
utilities.systemInformerDesc: Advanced system monitor and process viewer (formerly Process Hacker)

startup.updateRequiredMessage: A new version is required to continue using the application

confirm.confirmDelete:
Are you sure you want to delete custos?

This will close the application and remove all program files.
